name: Lil Pothead
description:
Meet Lil Pothead - your average trash-talking, weed-growing, dope-smoking, pizza-eating virtual pet... uh pot. There's only one issue: he's got no hands to do any of those things by himself and he needs your help!

If you can take care of all his needs, by feeding, cleaning & entertaining your Lil Pothead, he'll grow the hottest Marijuana strains as seen in Weed Shop The Game but in 2D :)

You'll be able to sell those strains to your ever-growing customer base and use that cash to upgrade the crib and pay Lil Pothead's pizza addiction and his divorce therapy.

Are you up for the challenge? If so, tap the Get button and adopt Lil Pothead now!

RAISE YOUR POTHEAD
-Feed him food, water, and sugary snacks.
-Clean his room on the regular.
-Make sure he gets enough sun.

GROW WEED
-Plant a seed and watch your pothead come alive.
-Give Lil Pothead special food to shorten grow times.
-Squish nasty mites and bugs before they get to your buds.
-Keep your pothead happy to increase the harvest.

LEVEL UP & UPGRADE
-Sell your weed and make loads of cash!
-Complete various tasks to level up.
-Unlock new strains, items, and upgrades.
-Decorate and upgrade the whole house to your liking.

INTERACT WITH POTHEAD
-Talk to Lil Pothead and he'll repeat everything you say.
-Pet him if he's been good or give him a slap if he screwed up your weed harvest.
-Record hilarious videos and share them with your friends.

Lil Pothead is not your average virtual pet - it's the best virtual pot in your pocket!
